API Endpoints.GET /api/topics/:topic_name/articles: Returns all the articles for a specified topic
API Endpoints.POST /api/topics/:topic_name/articles: Posts a new article for a specified topic. NB: This route requires a JSON-body input with title and body key value pairs (eg: { 'title': 'new article', 'body': 'This is my new article content' })
API Endpoints.PUT /api/articles/:article_id: Increments or decrements the votes of a specified article by one. NB: This route requires a vote query of 'up' or 'down' (eg: /api/articles/:article_id?vote=up)
API Endpoints.GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Returns all the comments for a specified article
API Endpoints.POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Posts a new comment for a specified article. NB: This route requires a JSON-body input with a comment key and value pair (eg: { 'comment': 'This is my new comment' }
API Endpoints.PUT /api/comments/:comment_id: Increments or decrements the votes of a specified comment by one. NB: This route requires a vote query of 'up' or 'down' (eg: /api/comments/:comment_id?vote=down)
API Endpoints.DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id: Deletes a specified comment if the comment was created by the Northcoders News user
